title: The Gilded Plate
description: Website design with online reservation system for a fine dining restaurant
purpose: To showcase a restaurant's menu and services.
stackExplanation: Used HTML for structure, CSS for styling, and JavaScript for interactivity.

title: Salco Global Solutions
description: Customer requested a redesign of their original website which was built in 2012
purpose: This is a redesign of an old company website
stackExplanation: Used React for the frontend, Node.js for the backend, and MongoDB for the database.

title: Pizzeria Rustica
description: Website and online ordering system for a specialty pizzeria
purpose: After learning React, I wanted to build a full-stack application. I chose a food ordering application to experiment with user authentication, database management, and payment processing.
stackExplanation: Used Vue.js for the frontend and Firebase for the backend and database.

title: Bayouside Tennis
description: Customer requested a website design with online tennis court booking, and a dashboard to manage bookings and payments for the owner as well as coaches
purpose: To manage tennis club memberships and events.
stackExplanation: Used Next.js for the frontend so that the website is SEO-friendly.

title: Tash Mode Online Shopping
description: Customer requested design of website with an online shopping platform
purpose: To provide an online shopping platform.
stackExplanation: Used React and Redux for the frontend, Node.js for the backend, and MongoDB for the database.

title: Stay Healthy
description: Website portal for patients in rural areas to connect with doctors
purpose: To connect patients in rural areas with doctors.
stackExplanation: Used React for the frontend, Node.js for the backend, and PostgreSQL for the database.
